tasks.forms module¶

class tasks.forms.TaskEndForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: core.forms.mixins.SoftValidationMixin, django.forms.models.ModelForm

__init__(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
  • Set the tasks_duration label
  • Set the tasks_duration as required
clean()[source]¶

Hook for doing any extra form-wide cleaning after Field.clean() has been called on every field. Any ValidationError raised by this method will not be associated with a particular field; it will have a special-case association with the field named ‘__all__’.

clean_tasks_duration()[source]¶

Check that the net duration is at least equal to the gross duration

is_initial_visit() → bool[source]¶

Returns true if this is the first time we visit the page. Defaults to checking if the current instance has a primary key. Can be overridden to do this check in a different way. :return:

class tasks.forms.TaskForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: core.forms.mixins.SoftValidationMixin, core.forms.conditional_form.ConditionalModelForm

__init__(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

clean()[source]¶

Check for conditional requirements: - Check if feedback has been filled out - If a registration which needs a kind has been checked, make sure the kind is selected - If a registration which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If a registration_kind which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If feedback is set to yes, make sure feedback_details has been filled out

get_soft_validation_fields()[source]¶

class tasks.forms.TaskStartForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: core.forms.mixins.SoftValidationMixin, core.forms.conditional_form.ConditionalModelForm

__init__(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
  • Set the Study for later reference
  • The field tasks_number is not required by default (only if is_copy is set to False)
  • Only allow to choose earlier Sessions
  • Remove option to copy altogether from first Session
  • Don’t ask the supervision question when there are only adult AgeGroups in this Study
clean()[source]¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If a setting which needs details or supervision has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If is_copy is True, parent_session is required - If is_copy is False, tasks_number is required
